DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate ( statistical ) non-inferiority iobitridol ( Xenetix速 350 ) compare contrast agent higher iodine concentration , iopromide ( Ultravist速 370 ) iomeprol ( Iomeron速 400 ) term coronary CT scan evaluability ( quality interpretability image ) .
DOC.brief_title: Xenetix速 350 : Comparative Assessment Image Quality Coronary CT Angiography
DOC.detailed_description: Patients suspect coronary artery disease submit coronary CT angiography use either iobitridol contrast agent higher iodine concentration ( iopromide iomeprol ) . Independent off-site reader evaluate image quality regard ability identify coronary artery stenosis ( score 0- non evaluable 4- excellent quality ) . The study aim show non-inferiority iobitridol ability provide evaluable CT scan identification coronary stenosis .
DOC.criteria: Male female adult patient ( reached legal majority age ) Symptomatic patient suspect coronary artery disease schedule coronary CT angiography Patient heart rate > 65 beat per minute ( bpm ) contraindication intolerance bblocker administration Patient arrhythmia nonsinus rhythm Patient decompensated heart failure Patient evidence ongoing active clinical instability ( suspect know acute myocardial infarction , cardiac shock , acute pulmonary oedema ) Patient previously undergone coronary artery bypass graft Patient previously undergone percutaneous transluminal coronary stent placement Patient artificial heart valve Patient know moderate severe aortic stenosis
DOC.keyword: iodinate contrast medium , coronary artery disease
